title: Adam Yates Lays Tour de France Warning with Suisse Climbing Smash
content:
Tadej Pogačar’s Tour de France superdomestiques Yates, Almeida go 1-2 on Cat.1 summit finish of Tour de Suisse, Bernal and U.S. sensation Riccitello impress.

Read the full article at Adam Yates Lays Tour de France Warning with Suisse Climbing Smash on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
